info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 12 at 12:39PM PDT until August 12 at 3:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northeastern Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... Northeastern Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 345 PM MST /345 PM PDT/. * At 1239 PM MST /1239 PM PDT/, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Mesquite, Littlefield, Bar Ten Ranch, Bunkerville, Mt. Trumbull and South Cove. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
